name: Paytm
description:

The app also handles bill payments, recharges, money transfers, and ticket bookings. features: Paytm App is used to pay bills, do recharges, send money to friends & family, book movies & travel tickets.

With innovations to financial services & products in the pipeline, this is but one of the milestones achieved towards our mission – to bring 500 million unserved and underserved Indians to the mainstream economy.

enhanced_description: Paytm is India's leading payments app, having pioneered the nation's digital revolution. It serves over 20 million merchants for digital payment acceptance and more than 300 million users across India. The app offers comprehensive services including bill payments, mobile recharges, money transfers, and booking of movies and travel tickets. Users can make secure, contactless payments in-stores or online via Paytm UPI or direct bank account. Beyond payments, Paytm provides accessible financial products like simplified insurance and quick, 100% digital personal loans. Its mission is to bring 500 million unserved and underserved Indians into the mainstream economy through continuous financial service innovation.
